the 1848 and 1999 swiss constitutions define a system of direct democracy (sometimes called half-direct or representative direct democracy because it is aided by the more commonplace institutions of a representative democracy).

while bears tend to be uniform in color, some species may have markings on the chest or face and the giant panda has a bold black-and-white pelage.bears have small rounded ears so as to minimize heat loss, but neither their hearing or sight are particularly acute.
they are unique among carnivorans in not having touch-sensitive whiskers on the muzzle; however, they have an excellent sense of smell, better than that of the dog, or possibly any other mammal.
